item.title: SABR with the new Hagan PDE Approach
item.description:
At a presentation of the Thalesians, Hagan has presented a new PDE based approach to compute arbitrage free prices under SABR. This is similar in spirit as Andreasen-Huge, but the PDE is directly on the density, not on the prices, and there is no one-step procedure: it's just like a regular PDE with proper boundary conditions. I was wondering how it compared to Andreasen Huge results.
My first implementation was quite slow.
